column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We love the pizzas and the salads and usually get delivery.  The website is not so great
column2: you cant order online and use a gift card or bonus certificate despite them having serial numbers.  So you have to call in and speak to someone in a noisy environment that might be in a hurry to take the order which i dont like because i like to review and see what i am committing to. and i forget to mention things on the phone like that we want the salad toppings on the side.  but the food is great so there.
